Body:
prot_ver = contents.ProtocolVersion(1, 1)
time_stamp = contents.TimeStamp(1335514341)
batch_count = contents.BatchCount(1)
response_header = messages.ResponseHeader(protocol_version=prot_ver,
    time_stamp=time_stamp, batch_count=batch_count)
operation = contents.Operation(enums.Operation.CREATE)
result_status = contents.ResultStatus(enums.ResultStatus.SUCCESS)
object_type = enums.ObjectType.SYMMETRIC_KEY
uuid = 'fb4b5b9c-6188-4c63-8142-fe9c328129fc'
resp_pl = payloads.CreateResponsePayload(object_type=object_type,
    unique_identifier=uuid)
batch_item = messages.ResponseBatchItem(operation=operation, result_status=
    result_status, response_payload=resp_pl)
rm = messages.ResponseMessage(response_header=response_header, batch_items=
    [batch_item])
rm.write(self.stream)
result = self.stream.read()
len_exp = len(self.create)
len_rcv = len(result)
self.assertEqual(len_exp, len_rcv, self.msg.format('response message',
    'write', len_exp, len_rcv))
msg = 'Bad response message write: encoding mismatch'
self.assertEqual(self.create, result, msg)
